title: White SPA Laser Tooth Whitening with Remineralisation Treatment for £99 at Hollywood Beauty Clinic (£329 Value)
highlights:
• Clinics in Uckfield and Hailsham locations
  • Includes consultation
  • Remineralisation treatment aims to restore shine
  • Many other treatments on offer

title: Follicular Unit Hair Transplantation Treatment for £1349 at the London Hair Transplant Clinic, Harley Street (Value £3400)
highlights:
• Have hair restored to your head via an insertion of 1000 hairs / 500 grafts
  • Procedure mimics the way hair grows naturally in order to look indistinguishable from your original hair
  • Performed by a qualified and GMC registered practitioner with 10 years of experience
  • Free consultation prior to procedure to discuss your aims
  • Evenings and weekends available

title: Charity Concerts in June: SingleTicket Friday 24th (£17.50), Saturday 25th (£16.75), Sunday 26th (£12.50), or SundayFamily Ticket (£40) to Music on the Hill
highlights:
• Friday: Katherine Jenkis and Wynne Evans; Saturday: Mc Fly and Sugarbabes; Sunday: Family Summer Day
  • Proceeds go to Demelza Hospice Care for Children and The Children’s Development Trust
  • Easy transport links from London and all of Kent
  • Hosted by XFM's Dave Berry

title: GolfLesson With Video Analysis and Intensive Short Play Instruction for £19 atSussex Golf School (£70 Value)
highlights:
• 1 hour driving range session
  • 1 hour chipping and putting lesson
  • Technique analysis with video
  • 50% off driving range tokens
  • 25% off next green fee and buggy hire purchased on the day
  • 15% off shop merchandise
  • Equipment and balls provided
